content:
Activity Name Impact of AI The reason for your classification
Guiding, Directing, and Motivating Subordinates  Only human performed Requires emotional intelligence and understanding of human behavior which AI lacks
Identifying Objects, Actions, and Events  Fully automatable by AI AI can quickly recognize and identify patterns in data
Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others  Only human performed Requires empathy and negotiation skills which AI lacks
Documenting/Recording Information  Fully automatable by AI AI can efficiently and accurately record information
Analyzing Data or Information  Augmented by AI AI can quickly process and identify patterns in data, but
